_description: On God’s gift of light and colour — one monorhyming quatrain in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
He taket oþer coloures arith& oþere coloures sewith to
                    mannis sithHit sewith defaute to eueri with& openliche it sewith
                    lith
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 11.
